title: Self-Directed Information Literacy Learning Program for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific research methodologies and experience with information retrieval tools
context.additional_context: A VR simulation-based training program for science field professionals to cultivate information utilization skills for solving real-life problems

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate reliable information sources with over 80% accuracy during scientific problem-solving
Learners can independently collect information by utilizing over three types of up-to-date academic databases relevant to research topics
Learners achieve a success rate of 75% or higher in decision-making simulation environments based on information analysis results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
